gov.nih.nlm.nls.cas

Class CasAuth

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.nih.nlm.nls.cas.CasAuth

  • public final class CasAuth
extends java.lang.Object
    An example Java client to authenticate against CAS using REST services. Please ensure you have followed the necessary setup found on the JASIG wiki. 
     ticket = getTicket(casserverurl, apikey, serviceurl);
 String String document = getProtectedDocument(serviceurl, ticket);
    Since:
    3.4.2 updated to use HTTP component library (http://hc.apache.org/) by Willie Rogers.
    Author:
    jesse lauren farinacci

    • Method Detail

      • getTicket

        public static java.lang.String getTicket(java.lang.String serverurl,
                                         java.lang.String tgtserverurl,
                                         java.lang.String apikey,
                                         java.lang.String serviceurl)
        Obtain a Single-Use Proxy Ticket from Central Authentication Server (CAS).
        Parameters:
        serverurl - authentication server
        tgtserverurl - ticket granting ticket server
        apikey - UTS profile API key
        serviceurl - url of service with protected resources
        Returns:
        authentication ticket for service.

      • getServiceTicket

        private static java.lang.String getServiceTicket(java.lang.String serverurl,
                                                 java.lang.String ticketGrantingTicket,
                                                 java.lang.String serviceurl)
        Obtain a Single-Use Proxy Ticket (also known as service ticket). Request for a Service Ticket: 
             POST /cas/v1/tickets/{TGT id} HTTP/1.0
        data: 
             service={form encoded parameter for the service url}
        Sucessful Response: 
             200 OK
     
     ST-1-FFDFHDSJKHSDFJKSDHFJKRUEYREWUIFSD2132
        Parameters:
        serverurl - authentication server
        ticketGrantingTicket - a Proxy Granting Ticket.
        serviceurl - url of service with protected resources
        Returns:
        authentication ticket for service.

      • getTicketGrantingTicket

        private static java.lang.String getTicketGrantingTicket(java.lang.String serverurl,
                                                        java.lang.String apikey)
        Obtain a Proxy Granting Ticket. Response for a Ticket Granting Ticket Resource 
           POST /cas/v1/api-key HTTP/1.0
        data: 
           apikey
        Successful Response: 
           201 Created
   Location: http://serviceurl/cas/v1/tickets/{TGT id}
        Parameters:
        serverurl - authentication server
        apikey - UTS profile API key
        Returns:
        a Proxy Granting Ticket.

      • getProtectedDocument

        static java.lang.String getProtectedDocument(java.lang.String service,
                                             java.lang.String ticket)
        Request for protected document using service ticket. 
            GET {resource url}?ticket={service ticket} HTTP/1.0
        example: 
           http://wsd.nlm.nih.gov/Restricted/Non-Reviewed_Results/index.shtml?ticket=ST-1-FFDFHDSJKHSDFJKSDHFJKRUEYREWUIFSD2132
        Successful Response: 
           200
        document is returned in body of response.

        Parameters:
        service - url of service with protected resources
        ticket - authentication ticket for service.
        Returns:
        document or null if authentication invalid.

      • notNull

        private static void notNull(java.lang.Object object,

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
